title: Trump Remaking Pentagon Leadership
itunes:title: Trump Remaking Pentagon Leadership
description:
Dr. Heather Fehling, Chief Scientific Officer at Clinical Reference Labs, discusses the latest on the coronavirus and rapid testing. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Latin America Reporter Andrew Rosati talk about the story “Zelle Has Turned Dollar-Starved Venezuela Into Cashless Test Lab.” Bloomberg News Pentagon and National Security Reporter Tony Capaccio shares his insight on President Trump remaking Pentagon leadership as critics see a crisis. And we Drive to the Close with Philip Palumbo, CEO and CIO at Palumbo Wealth Management.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
